author: smuzaffar
body:
#### PR description:

Fixes needed for GCC 10.
1. `bin >= 0` is always true as `bin` is of type `size_t (unsigned)`
2. For `index > (sz - 1)` , GCC 10 complains 
```
error: comparison of unsigned expression in '< 0' is always false
```

#### PR validation:

Local build with GCC 10 and normal IB look good
title: [DB] Fixes needed for GCC 10
